edu.illinois.masalzr2.gui

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.masalzr2.gui.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Control class. Goes through the process of player's trading assets.
    Author:
    Miguel Salazar

    • Constructor Detail

      • TradeManager

        public TradeManager(Environment gv,
                    Player p1,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Player> map)
        Trade Manager's only constructor. Requires a full list of active players and the Player who wishes to trade with another
        Parameters:
        gv - Environment object that is the game instance
        p1 - First Player who wishes to make an offer for another player's asset
        map - Full list of players active or inactive in the game

    • Method Detail

      • runManager

        public void runManager()
        Controls the process of the Trade Manager. Runs through each step until the request is canceled or completed

      • doTheTrade

        public void doTheTrade()
        Performs the trade.

      • setStep

        public void setStep(int s)
        Sets the current step of the manager. Step 0- The Prompt asking which player (player 2) the first player wishes to trade with Step 1- The Offer where player 1 makes an offer for player 2's asset Step 2- The Confirmation step where the trade is finialized
        Parameters:
        s - int value denoting which step you'd like to begin

      • getStep

        public int getStep()
        Sets the current step of the manager. Step 0- The Prompt asking which player (player 2) the first player wishes to trade with Step 1- The Offer where player 1 makes an offer for player 2's asset Step 2- The Confirmation step where the trade is finialized
        Returns:
        an int value denoting the cirrent step

      • setPlayer1

        public void setPlayer1(Player p)
        Defines the player making the offer for another player's assets
        Parameters:
        p - Player object

      • setPlayer2

        public void setPlayer2(Player p)
        Defines the player with the desired asset
        Parameters:
        p - the associated player in the trade

      • setTradeAsset

        public void setTradeAsset(java.lang.Object a)
        Defines the desired asset held by player 2
        Parameters:
        a - Asset object

      • getTradeAsset

        public java.lang.Object getTradeAsset()
        Returns the desired asset object that is up for bargain
        Returns:
        Could be a String or Property object which represents a Get out of Jail Free card or a property to trade respectively

      • setOfferedAsset

        public void setOfferedAsset(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> a)
        Sets the assets to be traded for the desired asset
        Parameters:
        a - List that must be a String, Integer, or Property

      • getOfferedAsset

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getOfferedAsset()
        Returns the ArrayList of Assets that player 1 has offered in trade of player 2's asset
        Returns:
        The list of assets the requester has offered to trade

      • isAgreed

        public boolean isAgreed()

        Returns:
